idea: “CHIPS AND BYTES INFOTECH” is a leading organization formed in March, 1992 by a group of dedicated people who are committed to outlive customer expectations. Motivated professionals who aim to achieve excellence through dedicated teamwork attend to every contact with zeal. We take pride in our ability to deliver efficient services at affordable prices. Now been in business for more than 13 years, providing hardware solutions and support to the various industries in and around. We are authorized resellers of COMPAQ, HP, IBM, TOSHIBA, FUJITSU, HCL, DATAMINI, SUN, EPSON, APC, INTEL, CISCO, 3COM, PACKETERS, MICROSOFT, ADOBE, COREL, LINUX, and MEDIAWARE. We provide maintenance services (A.M.C) to Multinational companies, corporate sector, Govt. sector, Private sector in India.
name: RAJENDRA V THAKER

idea:
Greeting for the day,

We at Asar Engineering introduce ourself one of the leading suppliers of the engineering & transmission product.

We have repeatedly tried to Enhance & Satisfy the need of the customers.

In this introduction, we would try to brief ourself and explain the services we provide in the field of Engineering Products.

Here is the list of the product we deal with.

1. All Types of Gear Coupling.

2. All Types of Sprockets.

3. V-Groove Pulley.

4. Transmission Roller Chain.

5. Timing Pulley.

6. Thruster Brake.

7. Universal Joint.

8. Cardan Shaft.

9. Rack & Pinion.

10. Conveyor Belts.

 

We have been most promising with our product quality and try to fulfill customer needs.

Achieving Scalability, Assurance & Reliability has been our motto from the beginning.
name: ASAR ENGINEERING

idea:
Soultribe wellness LLP under the brand name of THE SOUL TRIBE is aspiring to become a community driven mental health platform, by creating a safe space for like-minded people to help each other and seek professional help through therapist/counsellors. Soul Tribe is a market place for any thing and everything related to mental wellness

Members will have an option to use various resources available on the portal to maintain a better mental health.

Our approach is more of problem solving than of just informing them about the various problems. We are here to give them permission to be sad, angry , upset but also give them way and means to get out of that space.
name: SOUL TRIBE WELLNESS LLP
